net.sourceforge.jaad.mp4.od

Class InitialObjectDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.jaad.mp4.od.Descriptor
      • net.sourceforge.jaad.mp4.od.InitialObjectDescriptor

  • public class InitialObjectDescriptor
extends Descriptor
    The InitialObjectDescriptor is a variation of the ObjectDescriptor that shall be used to gain initial access to content.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class net.sourceforge.jaad.mp4.od.Descriptor

    • Constructor Detail

      • InitialObjectDescriptor

        public InitialObjectDescriptor()

    • Method Detail

      • getObjectDescriptorID

        public int getObjectDescriptorID()
        The ID uniquely identifies this ObjectDescriptor within its name scope. It should be within 0 and 1023 exclusively. The value 0 is forbidden and the value 1023 is reserved.
        Returns:
        this ObjectDescriptor's ID

      • includesInlineProfiles

        public boolean includesInlineProfiles()
        A flag that, if set, indicates that the subsequent profile indications take into account the resources needed to process any content that may be inlined.
        Returns:
        true if this ObjectDescriptor includes inline profiles

      • isURLPresent

        public boolean isURLPresent()
        A flag that indicates the presence of a URL. If set, no profiles are present.
        Returns:
        true if a URL is present

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()
        A URL String that shall point to another InitialObjectDescriptor. If no URL is present (if isURLPresent() returns false) this method returns null.
        Returns:
        a URL String or null if none is present

      • areProfilesPresent

        public boolean areProfilesPresent()
        A flag that indicates the presence of profiles. If set, no URL is present.
        Returns:
        true if profiles are present

      • getODProfile

        public int getODProfile()

      • getSceneProfile

        public int getSceneProfile()
        An indication of the scene description profile required to process the content associated with this InitialObjectDescriptor.
        The value should be one of the following: 0x00: reserved for ISO use 0x01: ISO 14496-1 XXXX profile 0x02-0x7F: reserved for ISO use 0x80-0xFD: user private 0xFE: no scene description profile specified 0xFF: no scene description capability required
        Returns:
        the scene profile

      • getAudioProfile

        public int getAudioProfile()
        An indication of the audio profile required to process the content associated with this InitialObjectDescriptor.
        The value should be one of the following: 0x00: reserved for ISO use 0x01: ISO 14496-3 XXXX profile 0x02-0x7F: reserved for ISO use 0x80-0xFD: user private 0xFE: no audio profile specified 0xFF: no audio capability required
        Returns:
        the audio profile

      • getVisualProfile

        public int getVisualProfile()
        An indication of the visual profile required to process the content associated with this InitialObjectDescriptor.
        The value should be one of the following: 0x00: reserved for ISO use 0x01: ISO 14496-2 XXXX profile 0x02-0x7F: reserved for ISO use 0x80-0xFD: user private 0xFE: no visual profile specified 0xFF: no visual capability required
        Returns:
        the visual profile

      • getGraphicsProfile

        public int getGraphicsProfile()
        An indication of the graphics profile required to process the content associated with this InitialObjectDescriptor.
        The value should be one of the following: 0x00: reserved for ISO use 0x01: ISO 14496-1 XXXX profile 0x02-0x7F: reserved for ISO use 0x80-0xFD: user private 0xFE: no graphics profile specified 0xFF: no graphics capability required
        Returns:
        the graphics profile
